front.title: Use of the Elliptic Curve Diffie-Hellamn Key Agreement Algorithm with Curve 25519 and Curve 448 in the Cryptographic Message Syntax (CMS)

abstract.t: This document describes the conventions for using Elliptic Curve Diffie-Hellamn (ECDH) key agreement algorithm using Curve 25519 and Curve 448 in the Cryptographic Message Syntax (CMS).
